00053     UpdateState::UpdateState()
00054     {
00055         mSuccess = networkManager->downloadUpdateFile("update.txt");
00056     }

00068     bool UpdateState::update()
00069     {
00070         if (mSuccess)
00071         {
00072             Packet *packet = new Packet(PAMSG_CHAR_LIST);
00073             networkManager->sendPacket(packet);
00074                         mSuccess = false;
00075         }
00076 
00077         if (inputManager->getKey(SDLK_ESCAPE))
00078                 {
00079                         return false;
00080                 }
00081 
00082         SDL_Delay(0);
00083 
00084         return true;
00085     }
00086 }
